Snarling Hidden Goose {/* Search */} setCategory(e.value)} /> setSearch(e.target.value)} placeholder="Search for movie/show" className="home-textinput input" /> {/* { setRating(e.target.value)} placeholder="Minimun Rating" className="home-textinput input" /> } */ }
{movies .filter((movie)=>movie.name.toLowerCase().indexOf(search.toLowerCase())>-1) .filter((movie)=>movie.rating >= rating) .filter((movie)=>movie.genre.toLowerCase().indexOf(category.toLowerCase())>-1) .map((movie)=> )}
